game.title: Quest of the Lost Amulet
game.objective: Find and return the stolen Amulet of the Sun to the Temple
game.description: Cheek in at the local inn for a clue from the wise bard, then journey to the Whispering Mountains where you'll locate the artifact.
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces and a magical enchanted sword

task.description: Ask the bard at the Green Leaf Inn about a missing artifact related to the Amulet of the Sun.
Follow the map's markers through the Whispering Mountains until you find a hidden cave entrance.
Inside the cave, locate and retrieve the stolen Amulet of the Sun from the safe spot.
